message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your cut seems a bit high, how about we meet in the middle?
I can go a bit lower, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is my last offer close to this split.  We need to agree soon before inflation eats away at the value!
I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. Inflation is hurting me too!
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this before inflation destroys the value for both of us.
